headline: Broken Economy May Keep Tehran From Waging War
abstract: Fearful of public anger over a plunging economy, Iranâ€™s leaders appear to be turning inward, pulling back from escalation.
lead_paragraph: Iran is caught in a wretched economic crisis. Jobs are scarce. Prices for food and other necessities are skyrocketing. The economy is rapidly shrinking. Iranians are increasingly disgusted.
